hero_title: A next-gen algorithmic contest platform for universities
features_create_description: Easily design and publish programming challenges tailored to your students' skills.
features_organize_description: Host official competitions and monitor progress in real-time with built-in analytics.
features_engage_description: Gamified experience keeps students motivated while sharpening coding skills.
how_it_works_description: MaxIT streamlines the entire competitive programming workflow in three simple steps
how_it_works_create_description: Teachers set up algorithmic problems with test cases and difficulty levels.

how_it_works_evaluate_description: Automatic grading, instant feedback, and leaderboard rankings.
cta_heading: Ready to Maximize Your Coding Skills?
